metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40303 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libxml2 before 2.10.3. When parsing a multi-gigabyte XML document with the XML_PARSE_HUGE parser option enabled, several integer counters can overflow. This results in an attempt to access an array at a negative 2GB offset, typically leading to a segmentation fault.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Maddie Stone from Google Project Zero

criterions.comment: libxml2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
